sourcesContent:
import {
    IonMenu,
    IonHeader,
    IonToolbar,
    IonTitle,
    IonContent,
    IonList,
    IonListHeader,
    IonNote,
    IonMenuToggle,
    IonItem,
    IonLabel,
    IonButton,
    IonButtons,
    IonCol,

    IonGrid,

    IonInput,

    IonMenuButton,
    IonPage,
    IonRouterOutlet,
    IonRow,
    IonSplitPane,

} from '@ionic/react';
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react';
import { useHistory } from "react-router";
import { Redirect, Route, useLocation } from "react-router-dom";
import Course from '../admin/quiz/Course';

const ViewCourse: React.FC = () => {
    const history = useHistory()

    const location = useLocation()
    return (

        <>
            <IonSplitPane when='sm' contentId="main-content">
                <IonMenu contentId="main-content">
                    <IonContent className="ion-padding">
                        <IonList>
                            <IonListHeader>My Course Name</IonListHeader>
                            <IonMenuToggle autoHide={false}>
                                <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/dashboard/view/course/topic' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/dashboard/view/course/topic" routerDirection="none">
                                    <IonLabel>Topic</IonLabel>
                                </IonItem>
                                <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/dashboard/view/course/quiz' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/dashboard/view/course/quiz" routerDirection="none">
                                    <IonLabel>Quiz</IonLabel>
                                </IonItem>
                                <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/dashboard/view/course/level' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/dashboard/view/course/level" routerDirection="none">
                                    <IonLabel>Level</IonLabel>
                                </IonItem>
                                <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/dashboard/view/course/question' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/dashboard/view/course/question" routerDirection="none">
                                    <IonLabel>Question</IonLabel>
                                </IonItem>
                                <IonItem className={location.pathname === '/dashboard/view/course/quizattempt' ? "selected" : ''} routerLink="/dashboard/view/course/quizattempt" routerDirection="none">
                                    <IonLabel>Quiz Attempt</IonLabel>
                                </IonItem>
                            </IonMenuToggle>
                        </IonList>
                        <IonList>
                            <IonListHeader>My Course List</IonListHeader>
                            <IonItem routerLink="/dashboard/my/course" routerDirection="none">
                                <IonLabel>My Course</IonLabel>
                            </IonItem>
                        </IonList>
                    </IonContent>
                </IonMenu>
                <IonPage id="main-content">
                    <TemporaryHeader />
                    <IonContent className="ion-padding">
                        <IonRouterOutlet id="main-content">
                            <Route
                                path="/dashboard/view/course/topic"
                                exact
                                component={Course}
                            />
                            <Route path="/dashboard/view/course/quiz" exact component={Course} />
                            <Route path="/dashboard/view/course/level" exact component={Course} />
                            <Route path="/dashboard/view/course/question" exact component={Course} />
                            <Route path="/dashboard/view/course/quizattempt" exact component={Course} />



                        </IonRouterOutlet>
                    </IonContent>
                </IonPage>
            </IonSplitPane>
        </>


    );


}

const TemporaryHeader: React.FC = () => {

    return (
        <IonHeader>
            <IonToolbar>
                <IonButtons slot="start">
                    <IonMenuButton></IonMenuButton>
                </IonButtons>
                <IonTitle>Course Name</IonTitle>
            </IonToolbar>
        </IonHeader>
    );
};
export default ViewCourse;
